result.markdown:
---
title: "iris figures"
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```
:::



## Scatterplot for Sepal 

Compare Sepal.Length and Sepal.Width



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: suppfig-iris-scatter-sepal

iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Sepal Length vs Sepal Width",
       x = "Sepal Length",
       y = "Sepal Width")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](iris_plots_files/figure-ipynb/suppfig-iris-scatter-sepal-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::




## Scatterplot for Petal

Compare Petal.Length and Petal.Width



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: suppfig-iris-scatter-petal

iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Petal Length vs Petal Width",
       x = "Petal Length",
       y = "Petal Width")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](iris_plots_files/figure-ipynb/suppfig-iris-scatter-petal-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::



## Boxplot for Sepal length



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: suppfig-iris-boxplot-sepal

boxplot_sepal_length <-
  iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Length, fill = Species)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Sepal Length by Species", x = "Species", y = "Sepal Length") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

boxplot_sepal_length
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](iris_plots_files/figure-ipynb/suppfig-iris-boxplot-sepal-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::



## Boxplot for Petal length



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: suppfig-iris-boxplot-petal
boxplot_petal_length <-
  iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Species, y = Petal.Length, fill = Species)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title = "Petal Length by Species",
    x = "Species",
    y = "Petal Length"
  ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

boxplot_petal_length
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](iris_plots_files/figure-ipynb/suppfig-iris-boxplot-petal-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::



## Combine the boxplots



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: suppfig-iris-boxplot-combined

boxplot_sepal_length + boxplot_petal_length + 
  plot_layout(ncol = 2, guides = "collect") + 
  plot_annotation(title = "Sepal and Petal Length by Species", tag_levels = "A")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](iris_plots_files/figure-ipynb/suppfig-iris-boxplot-combined-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::
